node.title: At America's busiest seaport, thousands of empty containers pile up
node.description: USÂ ports have been inundated with cargo since the COVID-19 pandemic shifted spending patterns.
node.content:
["A logjam at the Port of Los Angeles\u00a0is easing, after record\u00a0numbers of container ships were made to wait and authorities dealt with a backlog of containers crowding its dockside.", "As of Tuesday (local time), there were 84 container ships waiting offshore to get into the Port of Los Angeles or its neighbouring sister port in Long Beach, an improvement from some recent days when the number topped 100.", "In normal busy times, only a handful of ships have to wait to dock.", "Port of Los Angeles executive director Gene Seroka said the sprawling complex had\u00a0\"24/7 capability\", but a shortage of truck drivers and night-time warehouse workers posed problems in establishing a non-stop schedule, along with getting importers to embrace expanded hours.", "\"It's an effort to try to get this entire orchestra of supply chain players to get on the same calendar,\" he said.", "", "
Experts say\u00a0it could take well into next year before the US and global supply chains return to some semblance of normality.(AP:\u00a0Marcio Jose Sanchez)
", "Among thousands of importers, \"we've had very few takers to date\".", "US Transportation Secretary Pete Buttigieg said that going to a 24-hour schedule\u00a0\"is, of course, not flipping the switch. There are so many players, even just on the grounds of port\".", "US\u00a0ports have been inundated with cargo since the COVID-19 pandemic shifted spending away from restricted entertainment like travel and dining out to physical goods.", "COVID-19 also reduced the workforce needed to keep goods flowing smoothly.", "Ageing truck drivers\u00a0retired early, while infection control measures have limited dock and warehouse staffing.", "There are now roughly 65,000 empty containers on the Port of Los Angeles docks, up about 18 per cent\u00a0from just a couple of weeks ago, Mr Seroka said.", "Mr Seroka said \"sweeper\" ships were being sent to shuttle some of the shipping containers\u00a0back to factories in Asia.", "", "
Railroads and truckers have made progress moving import containers.(AP:\u00a0Marcio Jose Sanchez)
", "Meanwhile, the number of import containers\u00a0\u2014 those still carrying cargo\u00a0\u2014 at the Los Angeles port had fallen by 25 per cent\u00a0to 71,000 since October\u00a024, Mr Seroka said.", "During the same time, cargo sitting nine days or longer dropped by 29 per cent, he said.", "Railroads and trucking companies have made progress moving import containers off the docks at\u00a0Los Angeles and Long Beach,\u00a0\u00a0prompting executives\u00a0to delay imposing a new fee on overstaying imports by one week to November\u00a022.", "The new fee would hit imports destined for truck removal after nine days or more on docks, and would start after six days or more for rail-bound cargo.", "Prior to the pandemic, containers intended for local truck deliveries spent fewer than four days on average on docks, while containers earmarked for trains stayed less than two days, the ports said.", "Ocean carriers like AP Moller Maersk plan to pass any new fees on to importers \u2014\u00a0meaning consumers could ultimately shoulder the extra cost.", "", "
Bookstores face supply chain crisis ahead of Christmas
", "AP/Reuters"]
